content: Loved your article! Reanne. It was refreshing to read a whole new perspective in the context of International Women’s Day. I have been reading so many articles that showcase women trying to prove that they are as good as men, the dangers and differential treatment that women still face in the 21st century, so on and so forth. It is unfortunately true and I started to feel really low after reading several articles on the same theme. And then I spotted your article.Your article celebrates womanhood so beautifully. It so beautifully calls out to women of the world to join hands and celebrate our very existence. Yes we rock!
